main_title.default: IFRS 16 compliance just got a whole lot easier thanks to AI-enhanced automated lease accounting software powered by Trullion

main_text.default: Lease accounting software can keep you ahead of IFRS 16-related changes thanks to seamless automation and smart AI-enhanced capabilities. Say goodbye to errors and regulatory risk, and hello to painless compliance.
